body.html:p: I've finally gotten around to cobbling together a templating engine for a blog. Right now there are still some major pieces missing, including a document index, a real home page, and most importantly something worth reading. Lately I've been working on a variety of FPGA demos built on top of nMigen. This work is publicly available in my nmigen-nexys repository. Once I get the rest of the backend for this site working, I'll probably write some articles about my experience with this.
